entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical-cli/v0.36.16
entry.content:
Changelog

  • f5c7943f2 Merge pull request #3226 from Infisical/support-systemd
  • 84cc7bcd6 add docs + fix nit
  • 159c27ac6 Add proper support for systemd There wasn't a great way to start the gateway with systemd so that it can run in the background and be managed by systemd. This pr addeds a install sub command that decouples install from running. The goal was so you can run something like this in your IaC:
  • c4512ae11 Update go.sum
  • d74197aeb Revert "use forked pion turn server"
